comment: Ms. McKee is awesome! Shes like a mama for us Music Ed Majors. Even after taking her class, she is still always there for me when I need her. Her class provided me with AMAZING ideas and activities that I have taken to the classroom. If I'm having a good or bad day teaching I can always call her for advice and I've been out of her class for a year!

This teacher is amazing. But please only go there if you're interested in music for your students. Too many came in without a care and it really hurt her since she's so passionate for bringing music in the classrooms. 1 test which was too easy and other assignments that were lesson plans but also easy and fun. She's amazing

I love Mrs. McKee!  Our class was always singing and moving.  She rarely lectures and teaches by having you experience music.  She always provides fast and positive feedback. As long as you pay attention and participate you'll succeed.
She is an AMAZING lady!! I loved her! Take this class with her no matter what!! Easy A

Talk about one of the sweetest people you will ever meet! This class is in my top 3 fave classes I've ever taken & she is one of my all-time fave professors. Each class is such a blast & SO MUCH FUN. She is so inspiring & wants to see everyone succeed - she is so helpful in making sure you do. Love love LOVE her. Make your schedule fit her.

Activities and assignments are useful and she is very helpful if you need guidance or clarification. Enjoyable for those who both know a lot about music, and those who dont. She makes a lot of sense as to why music is important.

Fantastic teacher, you'll learn far more than just about music education. Let's you attempt lessons in class, which is fun. She does treat you as though you are about 10yrs old, but that's so you know what your students are going through.
